column1: Visitation will be held from 6:00-8:00 p.m.
column4: 2015 at Roller Funeral Home Chapel in Paris. Funeral Service will be held at 10:00 a.m.
column7: 2015 at Roller Funeral Home Chapel with Rev. Kenny Maness officiating. Burial will be in Oakhill Cemetery in Booneville under the direction of Roller Funeral Home.
